name: CI/CD Pipeline

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master
      - develop # Lägg till develop här

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

concurrency:
  group: "pages"
  cancel-in-progress: true

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    # Dessa används för miljövariabler i bygget eller för sed-ersättning
    env:
      FIREBASE_API_KEY: ${{ secrets.VITE_FIREBASE_API_KEY }}
      FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN: ${{ secrets.VITE_FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN }}
      FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID: ${{ secrets.VITE_FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID }}
      FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET: ${{ secrets.VITE_FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET }}
      FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID: ${{ secrets.VITE_FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID }}
      FIREBASE_APP_ID: ${{ secrets.VITE_FIREBASE_APP_ID }}

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Setup Node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: "20"
          cache: "npm"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Security Audit
        run: npm audit --audit-level=high

      - name: Lint and Typecheck
        run: |
          npm run lint
          npx tsc -b

      - name: Run Tests & Coverage
        run: npm run test

      - name: Cache SonarCloud packages
        uses: actions/cache@v4
        with:
          path: ~/.sonar/cache
          key: ${{ runner.os }}-sonar
          restore-keys: ${{ runner.os }}-sonar

      - name: SonarQube Scan
        uses: SonarSource/sonarqube-scan-action@v6
        env:
          SONAR_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.SONAR_TOKEN }}
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}

      # NYTT STEG: Injicera hemligheter i din Angular config-fil före bygget
      - name: Inject Firebase Secrets
        run: |
          CONFIG_FILE="./src/app/core/firebase.config.ts"
          sed -i "s|PLACEHOLDER_API_KEY|$FIREBASE_API_KEY|g" $CONFIG_FILE
          sed -i "s|PLACEHOLDER_AUTH_DOMAIN|$FIREBASE_AUTH_DOMAIN|g" $CONFIG_FILE
          sed -i "s|PLACEHOLDER_PROJECT_ID|$FIREBASE_PROJECT_ID|g" $CONFIG_FILE
          sed -i "s|PLACEHOLDER_STORAGE_BUCKET|$FIREBASE_STORAGE_BUCKET|g" $CONFIG_FILE
          sed -i "s|PLACEHOLDER_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID|$FIREBASE_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID|g" $CONFIG_FILE
          sed -i "s|PLACEHOLDER_APP_ID|$FIREBASE_APP_ID|g" $CONFIG_FILE

      - name: Build
        run: npm run build

      # Vi laddar bara upp artifact om vi faktiskt ska deploya (på master)
      - name: Upload artifact
        if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/master'
        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: "./dist"

  deploy:
    # Denna körs nu ENDAST om vi är på master-branchen
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/master'
    environment:
      name: github-pages
      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: build
    steps:
      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4

  lighthouse:
    # Denna körs också ENDAST på master efter lyckad deploy
    if: github.ref == 'refs/heads/master'
    needs: deploy
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Run Lighthouse with Assertions
        uses: treosh/lighthouse-ci-action@v12
        with:
          urls: "https://jojjeboy.github.io/looplist/"
          uploadArtifacts: true
          temporaryPublicStorage: true
          assertions: |
            {
              "categories:performance": ["error", {"minScore": 0.9}],
              "categories:accessibility": ["error", {"minScore": 0.9}],
              "categories:best-practices": ["error", {"minScore": 0.9}],
              "categories:seo": ["error", {"minScore": 0.9}],
              "categories:pwa": ["warn", {"minScore": 0.8}]
            }
